name: 10 Seconds Or Less (BottleDev)
description:
New Hire Huh?

Well welcome to 10 Seconds Or Less! The only multimedia pizza production company that can deliver cheesy goodness to their customers in 10 seconds or less.

To do your job, just drive around and wait for the lights outside the shop to light up red! Once they do, grab the goods and haul it over to the house or houses with the blue lights on. Make it in time and you’ll get a hefty reward. Take too long and the cheesy goodness will fade from reality and turn to dust. Also you’ll get fired.

Good luck!

WS to increase and decrease throttle

AD to turn left and right respectively!
